verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:38
verses.text: And Saul said, Draw ye near hither, all the chief of the people: and know and see wherein this sin hath been this day.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:39
verses.text: For, as the Lord liveth, which saveth Israel, though it be in Jonathan my son, he shall surely die. But there was not a man among all the people that answered him.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:40
verses.text: Then said he unto all Israel, Be ye on one side, and I and Jonathan my son will be on the other side. And the people said unto Saul, Do what seemeth good unto thee.
